casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Albert Earl SPEARMAN. No. 574P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 3, 2005. William P. Hart, Special Deputy Attorney General, Howard S. Boney, Jr., District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 6th day of October 2005 by Defendant for Writ of Certiorari:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference this the 3rd day of November 2005."
